titles.title: When On The Cross My Lord I See (easy nice)

properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}When on the cross my Lord I see Bleeding to death for wretched me Satan and sin no more can move For I am all transform'd to love{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}His thorns and nails pierce Through my heart In every groan I bear a part I view His wounds with Streaming eyes But see He bows His head and dies{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Come sinners view The Lamb of God Wounded and dead And bathed in blood Behold His side And venture near The well of endless life is here{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Here I forget my cares and pains I drink yet still my thirst remains Only the fountain-head above Can satisfy the thirst of love{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Oh that I thus could always feel Lord more and more Thy love reveal Then my glad tongue Shall loud proclaim The grace and glory of Thy name{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Thy name dispels my guilt and fear Revives my heart And charms my ear Affords a balm for every wound And Satan trembles at the sound{/lang-eng}
